Title: Masters of Influence
Description: Collect resources, build towers, attack your enemies, and expand your influence. A board-game styled game for XBox 360 and XBLA, second attempt.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

Collect resources, build towers, attack your enemies, and expand your influence. A board-game styled game for XBox 360 and XBLA: my second attempt.

Uses GPU instancing, trees, and particle systems.
